title: (x) Playstation Magazine cover type - Logasmen, ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Conor}
content:
there are two fonts higlited. the real intersest is in the futuristic looking font.

closest thing i have found is a font named "babyface" but its not close enough.

any help in identifying this font would be much appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429234949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mystery-font_3681.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mystery-font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429234949/http:/typophile.com/files/mystery-font.jpg) | 185.09 KB |
author: leasim

comments.content: I can’t tell exactly what the word **MAGAZINE** is set in as the sample is too small, but it looks like it could be [Bernhard Gothic Extra Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20120429234949/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/bernhard-gothic/urw-t-extra-heavy/).
thanks Conor. youve been a big help.
